poem:
Title: "Fragmented Echoes in a Winter Sketch"

Snowflakes falling gentle on Nikopol, 
Where a man once lived between shadows.
Now only whispers of artillery, 
like fevered dreams on frozen soil. 

Houses bent, power lines weeping, 
Fate's cruel hands in a quiet symphony.
Yet within this chaos, there lurks a tender silence,
An everlasting dance with timeless defiance.
